author: Chris Ciaccia
title: Coronavirus could be 'sniffed' out by dogs, experts say
description: The coronavirus pandemic has upended nearly every facet of day-to-day life around the globe, but one charity is hoping this everyday activity can help flatten the curve — dogs sniffing.
content:
